title: The Professor at the Breakfast Table Tone Opening

content.prompt: The narrator’s tone in the second paragraph (“This was . . . morning”) suggests that the narrator actually views the Poor Relation’s remark to the divinity-student as

choices.label: not representative of the majority opinion

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
